author: Mairead McGuiness
title: Mairead McGuinness: The European Parliament has a role in the fight against Covid-19
description: The single market must continue to function smoothly
content:
It all happened so fast. We followed the news from Wuhan with concern - people getting sick, dying and China shutting down to control the rapid and deadly spread of Covid-19.
What was so distant from us, is no longer so. Suddenly, the virus had jumped to our… [+4158 chars]
